metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3232 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Open redirect vulnerability in the Field UI module in Drupal 7.x before 7.38 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via a URL in the destinations parameter.

notes.Note: sbeattie> drupal6-mod-cck may get a separate CVE

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
